remarks: Substitution deduction for alternating congruence.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Oct-2014.)
statement:
acongeq12d.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = C ) $.
acongeq12d.2 $e |- ( ph -> D = E ) $.
acongeq12d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A || ( B - D ) \/ A || ( B - -u D ) ) <-> ( A || ( C - E ) \/ A || ( C - -u E ) ) ) ) $.
